S.FORM: Ernie Beck nilacul nalecuh ciniza i Philadelphia, Pennsylvania, nanu syubay kanas mali miunduay nu Amilika NBA nisakaput, pahanhanan tu kawaw ayza. Ernie Beck i 1953 a mihcaan NBA sapapili' mimaliay a kawaw, namapili' tu nu Philadelphia Warriors putiput. nalecuhan ciniza i 12 a bulad 11 a demiad, 1931 a mihcaan, Ernie Beck, u miunduay a kawaw. namakayniay a nasulitan nasakamuan atu natinengan Lists of National Basketball Association players
